name: no-guard

effect.x-y: Due to a glitch, moves affected by this ability have a (100 - accuracy)% chance to hit through detect or protect.
effect.omega-ruby-alpha-sapphire: Due to a glitch, moves affected by this ability have a (100 - accuracy)% chance to hit through detect or protect.

short_effect: Ensures all moves used by and against the Pokémon hit.

flavor_text.x-y: Ensures attacks by or against the Pokémon land.
flavor_text.omega-ruby-alpha-sapphire: Ensures that attacks by or against the Pokémon will land.
